channel.title: Help with lag/jumping
channel.description: when i log on to fresh just dled source and client its jumpy/laggy but when i try a different client it still laggs so im thinking its the source so what should i do to stop this?

item.title: Help with lag/jumping
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

Try cleaning the server out. clean out any junk that is in it. You can always remove TPC. or get a new base.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with lag/jumping
item.dc:creator: @Desetto Desetto
item.description:
@Desetto wrote:

If itâ€™s a source with a large Autospawn.cfg, I would start with removing the unnecessary NPCs from the file. You may also have too large of a process() boolean, so try removing any dead codes from that. Using conventions is also helpful with the readability.

Read full topic
